message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  My initial offer is $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer.  While I believe this product would be a good fit, $20,000 is a bit outside my budget.  Would you consider $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate you getting back to me.  While I understand your position, $10,000 is significantly below the value of this product. Could you do $17,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $17,000 is still a little high for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,500?
